entry.title: dsoumitra693/quark-db: QuarkDB is a lightweight, in-memory database built with TypeScript that provides Redis-compatible functionality with a modern developer experience. entry.content: QuarkDB is a lightweight, in-memory database built with TypeScript that provides Redis-compatible functionality with a modern developer experience. It implements efficient data structures and supports the RESP (Redis Serialization Protocol) for seamless communication.
